body: Good for you two guys below me that enjoy page 21 'low scat' fetish, shit does nothing for me. Other than that, it's alright, story is your typical big machos ordering idols to do whatever shit they want 'em to cuz it's hentai after all. Art is good, Dokurosan's style consists of ragged lines but with a clear consistency and structure.
@analcat Same. Dokuro is just way to kinky. especially when translated.
i always bust halfway thru in dokurasans hentai. the best part was page 21 talking about how they are shiting thicker after so much anal
